subject: Football
College Athletics
Boxing
Nursing and Nurses
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In the lead-up to this week’s N.F.L. draft, Carlton Mitchell has been an unexpected find for the league’s talent evaluators, and he owes much to his mother, Angela, who works in boxing.
snippet: In the lead-up to this week’s N.F.L. draft, Carlton Mitchell has been an unexpected find for the league’s talent evaluators, and he owes much to his mother, Angela, who works in boxing.
